scripts.start: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 nodemon --exec "node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from \"node:module\"; import { pathToFileURL } from \"node:url\"; register(\"ts-node/esm\", pathToFileURL(\"./\"));'" src/server.ts
scripts.dev: nodemon --exec "node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from \"node:module\"; import { pathToFileURL } from \"node:url\"; register(\"ts-node/esm\", pathToFileURL(\"./\"));'" src/server.ts
